definitions: a person who repairs or renovates a building, work of art, etc. so as to return it to its original condition

examples.text: an accomplished restorer of old furniture

shortDefinitions: person who repairs or renovates building, work of art, etc. so as to return it to its original condition

definitions: a person who brings back or re-establishes a previous right, practice, or situation

examples.text: the military's attempts to present themselves as restorers of law and order

shortDefinitions: person who brings back or re-establishes previous right, practice, or situation

definitions: something that returns a person or thing to a former condition

examples.text: sleep is a great restorer of the exhausted nerves

shortDefinitions: something that returns person or thing to a former condition
